gw.api.web.payment

Class DirectBillPaymentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.payment.DirectBillPaymentView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModifyingDirectBillPaymentView, MoveDirectBillPaymentView

    public class DirectBillPaymentView
extends java.lang.Object
    View class for direct bill payments to handle non persistent UI work

    • Method Detail

      • repopulatePaymentItems

        public void repopulatePaymentItems(DirectBillPmntAcctRole role,
                          DirectBillPmntAccts relevantAccounts,
                          DistributionLimitType limitFilter)
        Based on the given settings, recreate the payment items, and re-allocate the distribution amounts on the items. This will preserve any manual overrides made against any invoice items.
        Parameters:
        role - What relationship between the Account and the InvoiceItems defines which items to include on the payment.
        relevantAccounts - What Accounts to look at for eligible items.
        limitFilter - What are valid statuses of Invoices to draw from for eligible items.

      • isAggregateByItem

        public boolean isAggregateByItem()
        Returns:
        Whether we are aggregating by invoice item.

      • onOverrideChange

        public void onOverrideChange(BaseDistItem distItem,
                    MonetaryAmount overrideAmount)
        Override the automatically calculated allocation amount for the given dist item, setting the allocation amount to the given amount.
        Parameters:
        distItem - Dist item to override
        overrideAmount - Amount to allocate to given dist item.

      • execute

        public void execute(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location)
        Execute this Money (and Distribution, if the option is set)
        Parameters:
        location - UI Location the payment was created in. This will be used to get the bundle to be committed.

      • execute

        protected void execute(Bundle bundle)

      • recalculateDistribution

        public void recalculateDistribution(MonetaryAmount amountAvailableToDistribute)
        Using the same payment items, re-allocate the money across the items, using the given total amount, and all the paramaters set in the view class. Maintains any overridden amounts.
        Parameters:
        amountAvailableToDistribute - Amount to distribute across payment items.

      • getPlugin

        public IDirectBillPayment getPlugin()
        Returns:
        Server Instance of the DirectBillPayment plugin.

      • isDoNotEditDistribution

        public boolean isDoNotEditDistribution()
        Returns:
        Whether the view should be prevented from editing the distribution.

      • isExecuteWithoutDistribution

        public boolean isExecuteWithoutDistribution()
        Returns:
        Whether to execute just the DirectBillMoneyRcvd, and not the distribution.

      • setIsExecuteWithoutDistribution

        public void setIsExecuteWithoutDistribution()
        Tells the view class to only execute the DirectBillMoneyRcvd when execute() is called, and not the distribution.

      • setIsExecuteWithDistribution

        public void setIsExecuteWithDistribution()
        Tells the view class to execute both the DirectBillMoneyRcvd AND the distribution when execute() is called.

      • isCanExecuteWithoutDistribution

        public boolean isCanExecuteWithoutDistribution()
        Returns:
        Whether it is permitted to execute this payment without a distribution.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Whether the amount is non-null.

        Parameters:

        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - if this is called on a screen that is not a Move Payment screen.

      • isMovedToSelf

        public boolean isMovedToSelf()
        Returns:
        true if this is a Payment Move, and the target is the same unapplied fund as it was before the move.

      • getOriginatingAccount

        public Account getOriginatingAccount()
        Returns:
        the originating account if this is a payment move, null if it is not.

      • getOriginatingUnappliedFund

        public UnappliedFund getOriginatingUnappliedFund()
        Returns:
